c.x: The Saint Regis Mohawk Tribal Gaming Commission ("Commission") shall be com
The Tribal Gaming Commissioners shall be appointed, and may be reappointed,
Enrolled member of the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe;
Twenty-one (21) years of age;
The following must be met to qualify to be appointed as a Commissioner:
Current employees of the gaming operation;
Gaming contractors (including principal of a management, or other contracti
The following persons are not eligible to serve as Commissioners:
No member of the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribal Council or gaming board may serv
No member directly related to, or living with, any Saint Regis Mohawk Triba
The Commission and its employees are prohibited from accepting complimentar
The Tribe recognizes the importance of an independent Commission in maintai
The term of office shall be three years and may be staggered. In the case o
The Commission shall name one of the Tribal Gaming Commissioners as the Cha
A Tribal Gaming Commissioner may be removed before the end of his/her term
No Tribal Gaming Commissioner or employee of the Commission shall participa
The Tribal Gaming Commissioners may receive compensation for their services
A majority of the full Tribal Gaming Commission shall constitute a quorum f
Meetings of the Commission shall be held at regular intervals as provided i
Any action required or permitted to be taken at a meeting of the Tribal Gam
Commissioners may participate in a meeting of the Tribal Gaming Commission
